name: Blackjack Avenue
description:
Blackjack Avenue is a casual Casino Blackjack Simulation.

Enjoy the experience of being in a casino without the risk of spending real money.

Play Blackjack, also known as "21" by getting cards from the dealer.

The goal is to get a higher hand than the dealer.

But don't get more than 21, or else you will bust and the dealer wins!



Use classic techniques such as Splitting Pairs, Double Down and Insurance.

Experiment with different betting / split strategies and see what works best for you.

The table has a 2K bet maximum.

There are no micro-transactions, or real money and you can play offline.

Use the Color buttons to split chips into smaller denominations if necessary.

Track your progress with the Stats page and improve your Blackjack skills!



You can choose the amount of decks used.

Options for the amont of decks include 1, 2, 4, or 6 decks.

Use the pixel-art ATM for more chips which draw against your profile's digital balance.

It's ok to have a negative balance.

If you feel your balance went too negative, simply reset via profile options and try again.

You're invited to Blackjack Avenue! Where your next BIG WIN is just a click away!
